name: Survival Fight Zombies War 3D
description:
In this game you have a limited health to kill the dead killer man zombies in this zombies shooting assassin hunt. Being an real hero you need to survive in Survival Fight Zombies War 3D and left no zombie for the dead in zombies dead island. Make a perfect Aim on the zombies in this island survival war and take head shots to survive in the waste horror land. You as a Royale zombie killer in the battleground of the zombies survival frontier in to the darkness in this zombie killing assassin arena. Now in your hands to kill all the zombies because you are homeless lone guy in the dead like a hunter to survive in this zombie hunter game. As a brave hunter you have to survive in the darkness of the dead zombies houses and fight like a hero with living assassin dead zombies.
Become a zombie shooter hunter by shouting on the killer 3d zombies into this dark survival game which are menace on the hunter of zombies killer. You are lone battle survivor into the fort nite of bad land of zombies hunt. Take your ammo in this apocalypse survival against the zombies and put them back to hell and left no zombie for dead.
Run and Shoot the monster zombies in the battle of Royale to become a real hero by taking care of all the survival rules and thinking that it was the last survival day on this waste of the land. Fight with the brutal zombie men, women and wild dogs in this zombie survival frontier game. Save yourself from zombie apocalypse and kill the walking dead zombies to becomes a killer of zombies hunter. Be careful in to the bad zombies land in to the dim light for the hunting of zombies to survive yourself.

This Survival Fight Zombies War 3D game is a real zombie shooting game. The gaming environment is breathtaking with immense and horror zombies. Grab your hunting gun for zombies and start killing in this zombie shooting game.

Survival Fight Zombies War 3D Features 

• Multiple zombies with many kinds of behaviors like dogs, mens, women and wolves.
• Multiple guns which can bring you real experience.
• Realistic shooting as a zombie killer hunter.
• Intense action and best controls.
• Thrilling challenging missions with zombies shooting.
• Horrifying 3d visuals and sound.
• Realistic 3D graphics.
• Easy simple controls
• It is a free game available on app store.
